title: STAT+: Texas attorney general sues Sanofi for allegedly providing kickbacks to doctors to prescribe its drugs
description: The Texas AG has filed a lawsuit accusing Sanofi of providing kickbacks to doctors, in the form of a free network of nurses and insurance support services.
content: The Texas AG has filed a lawsuit accusing Sanofi of providing kickbacks to doctors, in the form of a free network of nurses and insurance support services.
